notes: Each agency handles own requests. Appeals to district court. Court must prioritize proceedings. Prevailing requester may recover costs and attorney's fees.

basic_request.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request
basic_request.body:
Dear Records Officer:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, Nevada Revised Statutes Chapter 239, I respectfully request access to inspect and copy the following public records:

[SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS]

As required by NRS 239.0107, please respond within 5 business days by either:
(a) Allowing inspection or copying of the requested records;
(b) Notifying me if the records are not in your custody and identifying where they are located if known;
(c) Providing a reasonable estimate of when the records will be available if they will be available within 30 days; or
(d) Citing the specific statute that authorizes denial if inspection or copying is denied.

I understand that fees may be charged not exceeding the actual cost of providing copies. Please notify me in advance if any fees will be assessed.

I prefer to receive responsive records in electronic format when possible to minimize costs. Please contact me if you need clarification regarding this request.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]

appeal_template.subject: District Court Appeal - Public Records Request Denial
appeal_template.body:
TO THE DISTRICT COURT:

Pursuant to NRS 239.011, I respectfully petition this Court for an order permitting me to inspect or copy public records that were wrongfully denied by [AGENCY NAME].

On [DATE], I submitted a public records request to [AGENCY] requesting [DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS]. On [DATE], the agency denied my request citing [REASON FOR DENIAL].

I believe this denial is improper because [LEGAL REASONING]. The requested records are public records under NRS Chapter 239, and the agency has not met its burden of proving confidentiality by a preponderance of the evidence as required by NRS 239.009.

I respectfully request that this Court:
1. Order the governmental entity to permit inspection and copying of the requested records;
2. Award costs and reasonable attorney's fees pursuant to NRS 239.012;
3. Grant such other relief as the Court deems just and proper.

I understand that this Court must give priority to proceedings under NRS 239.011.

Respectfully submitted,
[YOUR NAME]
[YOUR ADDRESS]
[PHONE NUMBER]
[EMAIL ADDRESS]
